titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Army, by way of recrimination against the Lords and Commons in Parliament, and the City of London; with a brief admonition from the whole kingdome to the Army and Generall, especially concerning the safety of the Kings Majesty his most sacred person. / Written by a well-affected Christian souldier.
titleStmt.author: Well-affected Christian souldier.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 22th 1648". The 9 in the date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
